resources.string: Sorry, no relevant data was found!
Search failed, please check the network connection!
Unknown error, please try again later! The error code is
This Software License and Service Agreement
The password requires a combination of 6-20 digits, letters and symbols, and cannot contain spaces
Do you confirm that remove the pictures you have added?
Please do not choose to repeat the picture
can only add up to 9 files
No track? Hurry and record your wonderful track!
There is no track in the cloud, try this refresh
Found new track, pull down refresh view
Network exception, please click this to refresh after connecting to the network
Please select a video smaller than 20M
Thank you for your valuable suggestions, thank you
operation failed, please try again later
Network exception, please check the network connection
Network exception, unable to add annotations
The current network is not in good condition, upload photos after waiting for network connection
The new password contains illegal characters?, !, #, etc.
Photo failed, please try again or select a photo from the album!
Unable to select video, please confirm the status of the media library!
The recording failed, please try again or select a video from the file manager!
can only upload records with content!
Please select the length of stay
Please select the number of companions
Uploading, can be viewed in [Point of Interest] or [My Album]
operation failed, please try again or use other methods
Mobile phone does not support new folder, exit photo
The storage directory was not found
There is a problem with the photo, please click the "+" above to select the photo
Load failed, please try again later
Your input contains illegal characters such as !, ?, #, please re-enter
Verification failed: account does not exist
Verification failed: password prompt information is incorrect
account password can not be empty
Login failed: account does not exist
After detecting the last interruption of the track record, do you want to continue recording the track?
Click the "Camera" button on the right to add a label
Are you sure you want to end the record?
The current positioning accuracy is low. It is recommended that you turn on GPS to improve positioning accuracy.
The current positioning accuracy is low. Click [Yes] to record the low-precision position, and click [No] to use only the high-precision position.
The record failed and failed to locate your location
End the record and successfully upload it to the cloud
End the record, failed to upload to the cloud
currently offline, the track is stored locally

An unknown error occurred in the upload track. The track is stored locally. The system will automatically retransmit the track that has not been uploaded to the cloud periodically. Do you want to try again?
There is no network currently, the track is stored locally, and the system will automatically upload to the cloud after connecting to the network
Please connect to the network and share it
Share failed, please check the network connection and try again
Share failed, please try again later
Automatic upload after connecting to WiFi
Please select the number of children
Are you sure to delete this comment?
Are you sure to delete the selected track? Once deleted, the track will be deleted both locally and in the cloud and will not be recoverable.
Are you sure to delete the current track? Once deleted, the track will be deleted both locally and in the cloud and will not be recoverable.
Database error, please upgrade to the latest version
This image was not successfully uploaded to the server
This video was not successfully uploaded to the server
Video download failed, please try again later
Click OK to download the latest version
You are using the latest version
Downloading the latest version of the app, you can check the download progress in the notification bar, you can turn off automatic download in the settings
Start downloading the latest version of the app, you can view the download progress in the notification bar
The latest version of the application download is complete, please click install in the notification bar

Are you sure to upload comments under the mobile network? It may consume more traffic. If you do not want to consume data traffic, please click [Cancel], the system will upload after connecting to WiFi.
There is no wifi network connection at present, it will be automatically uploaded after connecting to wifi network
Are you sure you want to clear the cached data for this app? Include photos, videos, and track information stored locally will be deleted
Are you sure to quit the app?
The track is currently being recorded. Forced exit will cause the track to be interrupted. Do you still want to exit the application?
Are you logged out of your current account?
The track is currently being recorded. Forced exit will cause the track to be interrupted. Do you still want to exit the current account?
press again to exit the program
Please agree to the Software License and Service Agreement
I agree to the Software License and Service Agreement
1. The software needs to get your geographic location information
2. The software needs to get your call recording time and SMS sending and receiving time, never check your call history and SMS content

3. You understand and agree that in order to provide you with effective services, the software will use the resources of your mobile communication terminal\'s processor and bandwidth to generate data traffic during the use of the software. Users need to know the relevant tariff information to the operator and bear the relevant expenses
4. Not responsible for the deletion or storage failure of your data in the software and services

5. Your use of the Software is deemed to have been read and agreed to be bound by this Agreement. Developers have the right to modify the terms of this Agreement as necessary. You can review the terms of the agreement in the latest version of the software. If you continue to use the Software after the terms of this Agreement have been changed, you are deemed to have accepted the revised Agreement. If you do not accept the revised agreement, you should stop using the software.
The type of track you selected is [Walk], please turn on the GPS before recording.

The track has started to be recorded. It is detected that the GPS is not turned on. It is recommended to turn on the GPS to increase the accuracy when the battery is fully charged. Click [OK] to turn on GPS.
Please open the network or GPS for recording operation, click [Open] to enter the GPS setting interface
Open mode:\n method 1. Press the GPS button in the top notification bar\n method 2. Select "high accuracy" in the positioning mode
Application error, please try again or restart the application
Sorry, the program is abnormal, it is about to exit...
You have not joined any groups, find the group you are interested in in [Add Group], click I to refresh
There is no group at this time, try this refresh
Are you sure you want to exit the selected group?
has sent the application, waiting for the administrator to confirm
This user has joined the group and does not need to join again!
Application failed to send, please try again later
Enter the group name to search

In order to ensure that the application can continue to run in the background, please add this application to the memory cleaning "white list" or "protection list". If you have already done this, please click [no longer remind]. Click [OK], it will guide you how to operate
Shandong University School of Management and Computer College jointly owned
historical motion data (green indicates the number of steps, yellow indicates calories)
turn on automatic check for updates
turn off automatic check for updates
Upload location only in WiFi state
Upload only in WiFi network status
Can be uploaded under WiFi and GPRS (2G/3G/4G) network status
Upload video and pictures only in WiFi state
Upload only in WiFi network status
Can be uploaded under WiFi and GPRS (2G/3G/4G) network status
set the time period of the time parameter update
Set the positioning interval in the recording state
positioning time interval in non-recording state
set the positioning interval in non-recording state
part of the original image failed to download, only the thumbnail
Click on the map to add a measurement point

Click the map to add a location point; click the back button at the top left to delete the current location point generated by clicking the map; click the search button at the top right to search for the start and end points of the path plan; click right The side path planning mode icon can switch the path planning mode (the default is walking), and the position point needs to be reset after switching modes
